betterquesting:10.desc:8:
There are some specific cubes placed 9x9x3 around the research table, and selecting them before starting the research will increase the probability of winning a certain card, but it will consume a little bit of inspiration, these cubes are as follows: 
\nBookshelf: probability of appearing the card "Annotation". 

Enchanting Table: probability of card "Research Enchantment". 

Beacon: probability of card "Aura Effect". 

Arcane Workbench: Increase the probability of cards related to alchemy appearing. 

Crucible: Increases the probability of the appearance of cards related to Alchemy. 

Core Setting Table: Increases the probability of occult-related cards appearing. 

Puppetry Workshop: Increase the probability of the appearance of Puppetry related cards. 

Rune Matrix: Increase the probability of the appearance of Arcane Injection related cards. 

Brain in a Vat: Probability of card "Dark Whisper" appearing. 

Portal: probability of card "Otherworldly Echo". 

The Sculpture Stone: Card "Research Sculpture" will appear. 

After the player completes the research of "Celestial Phase Research": the card "Celestial Phase Research" will appear with a probability. 

Inspiration Engine (Source > 5): Increase 1~3 "Gain Inspiration" cards according to the remaining Source (5~15). 

Madness Engine (Source > 5): Increases the number of "Gain Madness" cards by 1~3 depending on the remaining source (5~15). 

Fissure in the Vat: Probability of "Fissure in the Vat" card. 

Fissure Monitor: Probability of "Fissure Monitor" card appearing. 

ME Controller: Increases the probability of an Energy card appearing.
